entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
